original_text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous, and his ears are open unto their prayers: but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil.
korean_text: 주의 눈은 의인을 향하시고 그의 귀는 의인의 간구에 기울이시되 주의 얼굴은 악행하는 자들을 대하시느니라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous
and his ears are open unto their prayers
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 귀는 그들의 기도에 열려 있으며

sentences.original_text: but the face of the Lord is against them
